ActJudges Act
SubjectRobin E. Brenner ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Donald I. Brenner
PrecisGranting of an annuity to ROBIN E. BRENNER, widow of the Hon. Donald I. Brenner, Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective March 13, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
